allow:
Bash(python -c "
import struct

rec_path = ''D:/DataSets/casia_Webface/casia-webface/train.rec''
idx_path = ''D:/DataSets/casia_Webface/casia-webface/train.idx''

# Read first few index entries
with open\(idx_path, ''r''\) as f:
    lines = [f.readline\(\).strip\(\) for _ in range\(5\)]
    print\(''Index entries:''\)
    for line in lines:
        print\(f''  {line}''\)

# Read first record
with open\(rec_path, ''rb''\) as f:
    # Read record at offset from first non-zero index
    for line in lines:
        parts = line.split\(''\\t''\)
        if len\(parts\) >= 2:
            idx, offset = int\(parts[0]\), int\(parts[1]\)
            if idx > 0:  # Skip index 0 \(often metadata\)
                f.seek\(offset\)
                magic = struct.unpack\(''I'', f.read\(4\)\)[0]
                print\(f''\\nRecord {idx} at offset {offset}:''\)
                print\(f''  Magic: {hex\(magic\)}''\)
                
                length_flag = struct.unpack\(''I'', f.read\(4\)\)[0]
                cflag = \(length_flag >> 29\) & 7
                length = length_flag & \(\(1 << 29\) - 1\)
                print\(f''  Length: {length}, cflag: {cflag}''\)
                
                # Read data
                data = f.read\(min\(length, 100\)\)  # First 100 bytes
                print\(f''  First 50 bytes: {data[:50].hex\(\)}''\)
                
                # Try to parse header
                flag = struct.unpack\(''I'', data[0:4]\)[0]
                label_float = struct.unpack\(''f'', data[4:8]\)[0]
                print\(f''  Header flag: {flag}, label: {label_float}''\)
                
                # Check if data after header looks like JPEG \(starts with FFD8\)
                for offset_try in [8, 12, 16, 20, 24]:
                    if data[offset_try:offset_try+2] == b''\\xff\\xd8'':
                        print\(f''  JPEG signature found at offset {offset_try}''\)
                        break
                break
")
